title: 进入服务器下线后就无法再次进入
author: CrazyPeanut
txt_content:
只有删除了world里面的playerdata之后才能再次上线。。。
后台没有任何报错。。

[19:56:25] [User Authenticator #1/INFO]: UUID of player crazynut is 5b58b675-ba65-35d5-b962-8d1e5623d6be
[19:56:26] [Server thread/INFO]: Connection received without FML marker, assuming vanilla.
[19:56:26] [Server thread/INFO]: Opening channel which already seems to have a state set. This is a vanilla connection. Handshake handler will stop now
[19:56:26] [Server thread/INFO]: [Server thread] Server side vanilla connection established
[19:56:27] [Server thread/INFO]: crazynut[/127.0.0.1:12942] logged in with entity id 638 at ([fb1]263.4965801977087, 11.5, -580.0731787186915)
[19:56:32] [Server thread/INFO]: [BanItem] 玩家 crazynut 拥有免检查权限,跳过检查背包
[19:56:47] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 19/INFO]: [BS-Teams] 保存 0 条队伍数据, 耗时: 1.3773 (ms)
[19:56:48] [Server thread/INFO]: crazynut lost connection: Disconnected

[19:56:51] [User Authenticator #2/INFO]: UUID of player crazynut is 5b58b675-ba65-35d5-b962-8d1e5623d6be
[19:56:51] [Server thread/INFO]: Connection received without FML marker, assuming vanilla.
[19:56:51] [Server thread/INFO]: Opening channel which already seems to have a state set. This is a vanilla connection. Handshake handler will stop now
[19:56:51] [Server thread/INFO]: [Server thread] Server side vanilla connection established
[19:56:51] [Server thread/INFO]: crazynut[/127.0.0.1:12960] logged in with entity id 1132 at ([fb1]263.4965801977087, 11.5, -580.0731787186915)
[19:56:53] [Server thread/INFO]: [BanItem] 玩家 crazynut 拥有免检查权限,跳过检查背包
[19:57:20] [Server thread/INFO]: crazynut lost connection: Timed out


上面分别是第一次进和第二次进。。。很迷 应该是什么插件的锅。。。插件删完是没问题的 没有MOD 
CatServer端




QQ截图20200308213345.jpg (118.03 KB, 下载次数: 0)

2020-3-8 21:33 上传







插件列表 。。 在ParperSpoigt上没任何问题

replies.author: 落花雨喵
replies.txt_content: CatServer不支持纯净端进入多世界, 请更换Forge客户端

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content: 提供一下有问题玩家的log

楼主没有报错吗？
楼主可以检查下客户端的模组和服务端的模组是不是相匹配

replies.author: CrazyPeanut
replies.txt_content:
落花雨喵 发表于 2020-3-8 21:35
CatServer不支持纯净端进入多世界, 请更换Forge客户端
成了 大佬那是真的牛逼
